message.name: ERR_USER_FV_PHONENUMBER_PERSONAL
message.locale: You must enter a Personal phone number if you enter a country code or a city code.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_PHONENUMBER_BUSINESS
message.locale: You must enter a Business phone number if you enter either a country code, city code or extension.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_PHONENUMBER_FAX
message.locale: You must enter a Fax number if you enter a country code or a city code.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_PHONENUMBER_MOBILE
message.locale: You must enter a Mobile phone number if you enter a country code or a city code.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_PHONENUMBER_PAGER
message.locale: You must enter a Pager number if you enter a country code or a city code.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A user must have a username. Please enter a valid username.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_FULLNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: User name cannot be empty. Please enter first name and surname.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_LOCATION_EMPTY
message.locale: A User must be assigned to a location. Please select a location.

message.name: ERR_USER_XFV_EXPIRY_DATE
message.locale: The account expiry date must be later than today. Please enter a later date.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_ROLENAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A user must have a role. Please select a valid role.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_PASSWORD_EMPTY
message.locale: The Password field cannot be empty. Please enter a password.

message.name: ERR_USER_XFV_PASSWORD_ERROR
message.locale: The Password field and the Confirm Password field contain different values.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGINRESTRICTIONS
message.locale: Login restrictions must apply to at least one day.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGINTIME
message.locale: LoginTimeFrom must be before LoginTimeTo.

message.name: ERR_USER_XFV_REASSIGN_USER_TASKS
message.locale: The Redirect tasks to user cannot be the same as the user being modified.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_SENSITIVITY_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a sensitivity value.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_APPLICATION_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an application code.

message.name: ERR_USER_LOGINTIMETO_EMPTY
message.locale: An access period to time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PASSWORDEXPIRESLOGINS_FV_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The number of logins after which the password expires cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_USER_PASSWORD_NOT_CHANGED
message.locale: Your New Password cannot be the same as your Current Password.

message.name: ERR_USER_INVALID_PASSWORD
message.locale: The password you have entered is incorrect, please try again.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_CLOSED
message.locale: This User is closed and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XRV_ASSIGNTASKTO_USER_CLOSED
message.locale: The user entered for Redirect Tasks To must not be closed.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_FV_ENDDATE
message.locale: The end date must not be in the past.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XFV_ENDDATE_CREATIONDATE
message.locale: The end date must be later than the user's creation date.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XFV_ENDDATE_ASSIGNTASKTO
message.locale: Reassign Tasks To field must not be blank when an end date is entered.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XFV_USERNAME_ASSIGNTASKTO
message.locale: The user entered for Reassign Tasks To must not be the same as the current user.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: This user is already closed.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_USER_CANCELLED
message.locale: The user is cancelled and cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_USER_ACCOUNT_DISABLED
message.locale: The user's account is disabled so cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XRV_OPEN_TASK_ASSIGN
message.locale: This user is assigned one or more open tasks and cannot be closed. Please contact the user's supervisor.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XRV_OPEN_TASK_ASSIGN_AND_NO_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: This user is assigned one or more open tasks and cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XRV_NON_CLOSED_CASES_OWNER
message.locale: This user is the owner of one or more non closed cases and cannot be closed. Please contact the user's supervisor.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XRV_NON_CLOSED_CASES_OWNER_AND_NO_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: This user is the owner of one or more non closed cases and cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XRV_NON_CLOSED_CASES_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: This user is the supervisor of one or more non closed cases and cannot be closed. Please contact the user's supervisor.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XRV_NON_CLOSED_CASES_SUPERVISOR_AND_NO_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: This user is the supervisor of one or more non closed cases and cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_XRV_ACTIVE_USERS_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: This user is a supervisor with one of more users reporting to them so cannot be closed.

message.name: INF_CLOSEUSER_XRV_OPEN_TASK_ASSIGN
message.locale: There are open task(s) assigned to the user. The user will be closed on the End Date.

message.name: INF_CLOSEUSER_XRV_NON_CLOSED_CASES_OWNER
message.locale: The user is the case owner of a case that is not closed. The user will be closed on the End Date.

message.name: INF_CLOSEUSER_XRV_NON_CLOSED_CASES_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: The user is the case supervisor of a case that is not closed. The user will be closed on the End Date.

message.name: INF_CLOSEUSER_XRV_ACTIVE_USERS_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: Active Users still report to this User.
